price: 130. Et s’ils se séparent (les deux conjoints), Allah, de par Ses largesses, compensera à chacun ce qu’il aura perdu. Allah est Large et Sage.
arabic: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغۡنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلّٗا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yatafarraqā yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min saʿatihi wakāna al-lahu wāsiʿan ḥakīman
